name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Digital Manufacturing
content: Publication: After several rounds of reviewing process, accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published into the recommended to the following journal. ★\[ Journal of Industrial and Intelligent Information \] ISSN: 2301-3745 DOI: 10.18178/jiii Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar, Crossref, Engineering & Technology Digital Library and etc. Some selected papers will be recommended among accepted papers will be recommended to be published in the following journal. ★\[ International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research \] ISSN: 2278-0149 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/ijmerr Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
